Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Recently my game started crashing everytime I load and fly an aircraft i made (which I quicksaved in flight). I've been flying it all over Kerbin for a while now but suddenly it started crashing (the game).

KSP: 0.90 Windows 32bit

Problem: Random crashes in a previously working aircraft. I used this craft for a long time (in one go) without any problems. Now I wanted to load a quicksave suddenly the game crashes after a few seconds, regardless of what I do. Sometimes it's fater than other times, and I managed to get out of this situtation, when i was going +550m/s. Thinking it had fixed itself, I tried to land, but now its crashing again. (The client, not the craft )

Mods Installed:

B9

Chatterer

CrossFeesEnabler

DistantObject

EVE

FAR

Firespitter

JSI

KAS

KineTechAnimation

Klockheed_Martian

MagicSmoke

MJ2

MP_Nazari

OPT

PlanetShine

ResGen

SmokeScreen

StationScience

TextureReplacer

Virgin Kalactic

Module Manager

-Ive been using all these mods since I got the game, without (many) problems. Half of them we're included in or needed for another mod.

I tried installing Astronomoer's Visual Pack & ATM, but the first would just crash the game upon loading and the second just would crash while loading.

Reproduction Steps:

It's a small and relatively simple aircraft, since I'm only in the beginning of carreer. It contains just 30 parts. The crashes only started occuring about an hour ago and happen seconds after loading.

I don't get the crash report which I used to get when this happens.

Log:

For some reason i don't get an output log with the crashes i have during the landing, but the earlier folders from during flight still have one.

I'll include both.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/tiiw22pfdznv7bo/AAD3PT3bzEJpO2xNKqKvtwO-a?dl=0 (Latest report, no output log)

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/6pu6j21k2hp3pen/AAD9esP0DmaQPR9OrJBK-HJpa?dl=0 (From earlier this evening, when these crashes started occur)

I know a lot of you will say to use the force openGL 'trick', but I want to run the game using steam, because I use 2 different computers. (I don't live at one place) I assume Steam uses cloud storage for KSP so I can continue where I left off earlier, haven't had the chance to check that yet though.

Thanks for the read and hopefully your help as well ,

Regards,

Itchyname

not able to help with much of it but did ksp actually crash when installing ATM? because the first launch after install will take a long time and will seem like it's crashed at times.

also, I don't think the game uses steam cloud atm, i've never seen anything syncing from KSP.

It loaded for about 30 min, the last 20 of which on the same file. Then I kept got 'KSP has stopped working', after which windows would search for a solution and then close KSP. Relaunching (with and without OpenGL) the same happends, although sometimes on one of the files just before/after the 1st one. (About 1/4th of the loading bar). I must note however that I think I only tried ATM with Astronomer's Visual Pack, because it would crash upon loading...

If my saves are (which I can check later this week), I might just as well use OpenGL and a USB drive to transfer the save files
